bioconda.name: bioconductor-exomecopy
bioconda.summary: Copy number variant detection from exome sequencing read depth

biotools.summary: Detection of copy number variants (CNV) from exome sequencing samples, including unpaired samples.  The package implements a hidden Markov model which uses positional covariates, such as background read depth and GC-content, to simultaneously normalize and segment the samples into regions of constant copy count.

bioschemas.name: exomeCopy
bioschemas.summary: Detection of copy number variants (CNV) from exome sequencing samples, including unpaired samples.  The package implements a hidden Markov model which uses positional covariates, such as background read depth and GC-content, to simultaneously normalize and segment the samples into regions of constant copy count.
